<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slip into Shadow](/Feats.aspx?ID=2351) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ability to cast at least one spell with the [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) trait

</column>

---

Your shadow magic bleeds into the space around you. Whenever you cast a spell with the darkness trait, a lingering aura of shadows reduces bright light within a 5-foot emanation around you to dim light until the end of your turn. Like in natural dim light, you can use these shadows to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62), but the aura still makes your overall position obvious, so you can't become [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) through the use of these shadows alone.
name: Slip into Shadow
prerequisite: ability to cast at least one spell with the darkness trait
